titleStmt.title: A discourse or traictise of Petur Martyr Vermilla Flore[n]tine, the publyque reader of diuinitee in the Vniuersitee of Oxford wherein he openly declared his whole and determinate iudgemente concernynge the sacrament of the Lordes supper in the sayde Vniuersitee.

titleStmt.title: A discourse or traictise of Petur Martyr Vermilla Flore[n]tine, the publyque reader of diuinitee in the Vniuersitee of Oxford wherein he openly declared his whole and determinate iudgemente concernynge the sacrament of the Lordes supper in the sayde Vniuersitee.

titleStmt.author: Vermigli, Pietro Martire, 1499-1562.
Udall, Nicholas, 1505-1556.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Stoughton [i.e. E. Whitchurch] dwellinge within Ludgate at the signe of the Bysshoppes Miter for Nycolas Udall,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Tractatio de sacramento Eucharisti√¶.
Translated by Nicholas Udall, whose name appears on *2r.
Imprint from colophon; actual printer's name and publication date from STC.
Running title reads: The discourse of Peter Martir vpon the sacrament of the Lordes Supper.
Quire z has four leaves; some text has been omitted. Variant: quire z has six leaves, with more text; z2 has verso blank and is pasted onto original z1r.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
